publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: Its abundant virtue is elevated and imposing.
Concerning the Way has altogether four things to investigate:
Concerning the Way has altogether four things to investigate:

sense.def: things to investigate, things that must be investigated

tls:text.tls:line: Among men there are five five types of people to flock to you:
the first type are those a hundred times better than oneself,

sense.def: be a hundred times superior to

tls:text.tls:line: the third are equal to oneself,
the fourth are domestic employees,
and the fifth are slaves.
are the principles and the real essence of things.

sense.def: cause to be patterned and orderly

tls:text.tls:line: is what is constantly there and will not move away.

sense.def: would not; refuse to; decide not to (do what one might otherwise have done); will not; fail to

tls:text.tls:line: is the hatred of death and delight in life.

sense.def: hate openly, detest, dislike strongly; LY 4.3: truly and properly dislike 甚惡"strongly dislike"

tls:text.tls:line: is the hatred of death and delight in life.
is the hatred of death and delight in life.
is the hatred of death and delight in life.

sense.def: be delighted when V-ing; de delighted to V; take delight in V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: is the hatred of death and delight in life.

sense.def: be alive; remain alive; cf. also shēng qín 生擒 "catch while he is still alive"

tls:text.tls:line: What is called fate,
is never other than what depends on the ruler. [XENOPHANES ADUMBRATED]
is never other than what depends on the ruler. [XENOPHANES ADUMBRATED]

sense.def: be subtle and beyond human grasp

tls:text.tls:line: is never other than what depends on the ruler. [XENOPHANES ADUMBRATED]

sense.def: depend on; be one's responsibility (在我)

tls:text.tls:line: keeps order in the realm of the spirits;

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:text.tls:line: the realm of the spirits

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:text.tls:line: is based on the worthies and sages as their basis;
then those who have ten times your calibre will flock to you.

sense.def: be ten times superior to; be tenfold in relation to 相十

tls:text.tls:line: If you stoop over your table or lean on your cane,
If you stoop over your table or lean on your cane,

sense.def: read jī: small table, low table

tls:text.tls:line: and give orders by pointing and signaling,
and give orders by pointing and signaling,
and give orders by pointing and signaling,

sense.def: keep control over, exercise control over contextually determinate objects

tls:text.tls:line: then "servants" will arrive.
then "servants" will arrive.
then "servants" will arrive.

sense.def: arrive on the scene; turn up; move in to take action; come to join

tls:text.tls:line: If you keep sighing with delight and shout with pain
If you keep sighing with delight and shout with pain

sense.def: cry out in anger; shout loudly

tls:text.tls:line: then "slaves" will arrive.
Thus, the true emperor dwells with teachers
Thus, the true emperor dwells with teachers
who would be able to cause confusion?
who would be able to cause confusion?

sense.def: read yíng: loanword for : be confused
the vital point; most important point. essential point; essence; main initiative; main controlling functions
get to change, change one's orientation

tls:text.tls:line: never go against his feelings;
never go against his feelings;

sense.def: real inner state; innermost feelings; real inner feelings; basic feelings; basic loyalties; sentiment

tls:text.tls:line: A true gentleman,

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:text.tls:line: Only when one's body may find ease with someone, but one does not dare to dwell there,
It is therefore that the person of worth in a disorderly age,

sense.def: abstractly: the man of talent and moral worth (at any time and in any place)

tls:text.tls:line: cutting off relations, has no position from where to communicate;

sense.def: opportunity, chance 無由 "have no chance (to VERB)"

tls:text.tls:line: cutting off relations, has no position from where to communicate;
Hence, men go against their genuine abilities,
They all have their tests,
nobody knows its qualities.
